subject: Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Perjury
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Evidence from the prosecution unsealed Wednesday in the Barry Bonds perjury case showed the ballplayer tested positive for performance-enhancing drugs in November 2000 and February 2001.
snippet: Evidence from the prosecution unsealed Wednesday in the Barry Bonds perjury case showed the ballplayer tested positive for performance-enhancing drugs in November 2000 and February 2001.
